name: AddProjectMember
description:
Add a new member to a Vercel project.

Use this tool to add a new member to a Vercel project using the project's ID or name.

parameters.name: project_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Vercel project to which a new member will be added.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Project.

parameters.name: member_details
parameters.description: Provide the member's UID, username, email, and role for the project. Role options: ADMIN, PROJECT_DEVELOPER, PROJECT_VIEWER.

uid.description: The ID of the team member that should be added to this project.

username.description: The username of the team member that should be added to this project.

email.description: The email of the team member that should be added to this project.

role.description: The project role of the member that will be added.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug identifying the team for performing the request.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Project.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Project.

uid.description: The ID of the team member that should be added to this project.

username.description: The username of the team member that should be added to this project.

email.description: The email of the team member that should be added to this project.

role.description: The project role of the member that will be added.
